comments.author: norrisboyd@gmail.com
comments.body: Committed changes to mainline for 1.7R1. Rhino now implements block scope.

description: Implement the JavaScript 1.7 feature for block scope with "let". See http://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/New_in_JavaScript_1.7#Block_scope_with_let and bug 336378.
summary: JavaScript 1.7 Block scope with "let" for Rhino
